text: I'm 99% sure the answer is no but you can't pull HubDB data from one HubSpot portal to another without the use of the API correct?
I dont think such tool exists. Export and Import should do..
You could do an ajax call.  HubDB are all publicly accessible via AJAX
Mind sharing a bit about the use case? What is the relationship between the two portals? Why are you looking to share the data?

I was curious about this because I setup a dev portal to test and stage pages. When I upload to the dev portal I get those errors because the db doesn't exist in the dev portal. If there was a way to port data from one portal to another that would be pretty sick...
:+1: - be on the lookout for changes in this space soon-ish that leverage the CLI for portability.
i have the same need to be able to push hubdb data between tables i look forward to the CLI updates for this
